comment: If ` P ` is a Sophie Germain prime (i.e. ` Q = ( ( 2 x. P ) + 1 ) ` is also prime) with ` P == 3 ` (mod ` 4 ` ), then ` Q ` divides the ` P `-th Mersenne number M_P. (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2021.)
